Jordan Riber bụ onye Zimbabwe a mụrụ na Tanzania, onye ntuziaka ihe onyonyo na ihe nkiri, onye odee, onye mmepụta, onye ndezi na injinia ụda.
A mụrụ Riber n'ezinụlọ nwa nwoke John na Louise Riber, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri, a zụlitere ya na Harare, Zimbabwe
Ihe ka ọtụtụ n'ime oge ya nọrọ na ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe mgbe ọ na-etolite

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2004 na Fairhaven College, Western Washington University, Bellingham, Washington, USA, ebe ọ gụrụ ihe nkiri. Kemgbe afọ 2005, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na injinia ụda na Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.

N'afọ 2012, ọ duziri ma dezie Siri ya Mtungi, usoro TV nke asụsụ Swahili nke dị ọkara awa, nke Cathryn Credo, Beatrice Taisamo, Yvonne Cherrie na ndị ọzọ gosipụtara. A họpụtara ya maka "Best Television Series - Comedy / drama", "Best Indigenous Language Movie / Series Swahili" na "Best Sound Editor" award categories na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards (AMVCA) event.
N'afọ 2017, ọ duziri ihe nkiri ahụ, Hadithi za Kumekucha: Tunu

N'afọ 2018, ọ duziri, mepụta ma dezie ihe nkiri ya nke abụọ, Hadithi za Kumekucha: Fatuma, nke Cathryn Credo, Beatrice Taisamo na Ayoub Bombwe gosipụtara. N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ duziri ma mepụta Bahasha (The Envelope), ihe nkiri nkiri, nke gosipụtara Ayoub Bombwe, Godliver Gordian, Omary Mrisho na Cathryn Credo.

N'afọ 2018 Zanzibar International Film Festival (ZIFF)'s official selection, Riber's Bahasha bụ ihe nkiri mmeghe maka mbido, nke ya na Fatuma tinyere na ngalaba "Long Features". N'ihe nrite ndị ahụ, o nwetara ihe nrite Best Director na Best Cinematography, na ngalaba pụrụ iche nke Swahili Movies.
